about_the_game:
Embody powerful Immortals to lead armies and dominate the battlefield in this competitive RTS. Engage in intense or casual battles with easy-to-learn, hard-to-master gameplay. Choose from a variety of Immortals and factions to perfect your strategy and conquer your rivals!

The Gates of Pyre have lain dormant for eons, closed by a forgotten apocalypse. Now, these ancient Ways roar to life. In their shadows, new nations have risen to lay claim to these Elder Legacies and the immeasurable power they hold. You are an Immortal, a godlike leader at the helm of a proud nation. Through conquest and cunning, you will lead your people to glorious victory or ignoble defeat. Choose wisely, each faction and Immortal is unique in their abilities and array of warriors. Break the skies with the Angelic Empire or command the beasts of the Deep Way with the Root Witches. The destiny of these worlds is yet unwritten, Immortal. Go forth, and write your saga on the battlefield!

As an Immortal, you bring unique warriors to your faction’s war-effort, augmenting and shaping your strategies. Wield Pyre to unleash devastating powers and outgun or outmaneuver your opponents in intense PVP or challenging PVE missions. Whether you enjoy casual team-matches or fierce competitive battles, IMMORTAL has a home for you and your friends. With an optional Build Assist function and a host of accessibility features, building and commanding an army has never been easier, allowing you to sharpen your skills and customize your strategy to suit your style.

  • Competitive RTS gameplay: Easy to learn, hard to master.

  • Diverse Immortal selection: Tailor your gameplay experience.

  • Unique Vanguard units: Command powerful forces.

  • Signature powers: Unleash devastating abilities.

  • Multiple game modes: Casual and competitive options.

  • Customization: Personalize your strategy.

  • Build Assist functionality: Focus on strategy without micromanagement.

  • Epic lore: Explore the rich history of the Gates of Pyre.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 or AMD FX-8350 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050ti or AMD RX 570 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700k or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD RX 5700 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
